Comment: Thanks. I love them both and they've shown us five kids lots of love raising us.  Once they have lived their lives to the fullest, and their times both come (not to sound morbid) and we've settled everything, my plan is to find a smaller town in central Florida not far from either coast, but not far from Orlando either. Just a nice distance to everything, pleasant to live in, and just live out my days there, fishing, camping, scuba diving, enjoying beaches and sun. Enjoying 60-degree weather while everyone up north is freezing their butts off during winter. I'm a warm-weather guy. Always have been, so Florida heat doesn't bother me at all.  My thoughts are to find a place big enough that siblings and their families can come visit the "fun uncle" in Florida whenever they want and have a place to stay for free for family vacations. (I'm living the single life but have nine (soon to be ten) nieces and nephews to spoil and be the "fun uncle" towards).
